comfrt.attn.tv/adjzl33fllvn

Shop up to 70% off sitewide on the coziest essentials.

Shop now: comfrt.attn.tv/aw3MKezvsO6E

Comfrt: Made to move with you.

Coming 1.28. 

Shop your favorites while you wait: comfrt.attn.tv/arlDJkSHsaM8

Comfrt: JUST DROPPED

Designed to move with you. Made to feel like you.

Introducing ComfrtCoreTM. Created for your body and mind.

Move your way:
comfrt.attn.tv/aPmRLMoRvHiS

comfrt.attn.tv/akweRkxxgbcp

Comfrt: Your winter remedy is here.

Comfrt: Upgrade to first class.

The VIP Airplane Mode Hoodie with a satin-lined hood and eye mask has officially landed! 

Also, four new limited shades just got added to our original collection.

Get it while you can: comfrt.attn.tv/a6UZWDW-5-kD
Which hoodies is less weighted ?
Comfrt: Our Basic Crop Zip Hoodie is less weighted, offering comfort without the extra weight. Check it out here: https://comfrt.attn.tv/a-mrDb-gBEjx
I do t like colors, anything else?
Comfrt: Consider the Airplane Mode Travel Hoodie for a lightweight option. It's available in various colors. Check it out here: https://comfrt.attn.tv/a3Ne_zeJDA8P
Thank you, I would love to order but really afraid because have very bad experience with return. I never received store credit for returned item
Comfrt: You are already subscribed. Click here to shop now: comfrt.com.

Comfrt: I'm really sorry to hear that you had a difficult experience with your previous return. I completely understand why that would make you hesitant to place another order. 

Could you let me know when the return was completed and what the last update you received from our team was? Please take a moment to check your spam and promo folders as well, since our store credit notifications and updates can occasionally land there. 

Note that store credit will be issued one week after our warehouse receives your return. If there is an issue with your return upon arrival, you will be contacted by our team. If you're unable to find any update or confirmation, the best next step would be to email us directly at info@comfrt.com Our specialized team will be able to review your return in detail and provide a clear resolution.
I sent email so many times to info@comfrt.com
No response!
I also te texted another rep and the response was;
Template used: "No response from customer support 2"; last updated: 2023-10-16 22:00:00.972

Comfrt: Thanks for letting me know, and I'm truly sorry to hear that! Could you please let me know when you initiated the return process? Also, we are dealing with an influx of support messages but this does not make your concern any less important. The team is working as hard as possible to address each issue promptly. 

They should get back to you soon!

escalate: ESC if the discount % is not the same as indicated in the automated message
templates: If cx asks if Comfrt was formerly another brand, use CFB shortcut

conversation.message_text: Kathy Kuo: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Kathy Kuo.
Kathy Kuo: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Kathy Kuo: You're in! Enjoy up to 25% Off + Free Shipping Over $1000 with code PREZ2026: kathykuohome.attn.tv/a0F-Gght9r7L . 

Shopping full price? Use code YOUREIN for 10% Off. Exclusions apply.
Kathy Kuo: Save our contact info to never miss exclusive offers and updates!
Kathy Kuo: Hey there, the piece you loved is waiting! Use code ALMOSTHOME for 15% Off + Free Shipping when you finish your order: kathykuohome.attn.tv/aJJsW6LnCFXt .

Kathy Kuo: Hi, I'm Sarah, your personal shopper for Kathy Kuo Home. Do you need help finding that perfect piece? 

https://kathykuohome.attn.tv/ab8GwwtVCJrb .
Kathy Kuo: The pieces you've been eyeing are still on sale, but not for long! Up to 25% off + free shipping ends at midnight: kathykuohome.attn.tv/aLjdn620S6YT
Hi there- I have item 145039 in my cart. I received a text that I can use a code for additional savings and free shipping. However when I use the code it is invalid. Can you advise??

Kathy Kuo: I'm sorry about that! We have quite a few vendors that don't participate in any of our sales, so our codes won't work on their items. Our codes also won't work if an item is already discounted, as discounts may not overlap.
Can you send a code for free shipping?
Kathy Kuo: I'm really sorry about that. We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
Why did I receive a text w a code for an additional discount and free shipping for the item in my cart if it is not valid for the item that was in my cart?
Template used: "Retroactive discount request"; last updated: 2025-10-23 16:05:56.432

Kathy Kuo: Thank you for getting back to me and providing that information! I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send a screenshot of your cart and the error message that you're getting, and the code you're trying to use? Just a heads up, if you're trying to use the code PREZ2026, it is only valid for orders over $1000.

escalate: Esc inquiries about items not on the site
ESC if the cx missed a sale & wants to take advantage of it
ESC if the customer is asking for a discount and we don't have one
If cx is looking for general recommendations use LFR shortcut and ESC
templates: If cx is building a new home, interested in refurnishing their entire home or rooms in their home, use the IDS shortcut
If cx is shopping for a client use SFC shortcut
Any convo without a positive outcome (out of stock, not on sale, not shipping in time), use DSS shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: For product-specific delivery time-frame inquiries always check the product page for delivery info and share that with the cx
